channel.title: Help - New server \\ Make self admin //
channel.description: Ok, i'm just a regular player right now what is the code i need to look for and wheres it by :confused: Would like help ty :D It's phonescape source Tongue pimpscape based...

item.title: Help - New server \\ Make self admin //
item.dc:creator: @Leumas Leumas
item.description:
@Leumas wrote:

That won’t work if you’re using TestScape.

For TestScape, you need to go into your client.java, and look for this line:

//start of moderator/admin list, 1 = mod, 2 = staff, 3 = admin if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("YOURNAME")) { playerRights = 3;

Find that using Ctrl + F, and change where i’ve written “YOURNAME” to the username YOU USE on YOUR server.

Hope that helps,

Sam.

Read full topic
item.source: Help - New server \\ Make self admin //

item.title: Help - New server \\ Make self admin //
item.dc:creator: @x0_0wn x0 0wn
item.description:
@x0_0wn wrote:

Actually, 3 is owner of any type, owner of the server and co-owner.

Read full topic
item.source: Help - New server \\ Make self admin //

item.title: Help - New server \\ Make self admin //
item.dc:creator: @Nirvana.Marijuana Nirvana.Marijuana
item.description:
@Nirvana.Marijuana wrote:

doesnt matter which base just open the characters folder and open up yourusername.txt

In there, theres a line that goes “Player rights = 0” (Near the top)
Edit the 0

0 = Normal Player
1 = Mod
2 = Admin
3 = (co)Owner

Read full topic
